9 using System;
10 using System.Threading;
11 
12 namespace ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI
13 {
18  public abstract class AbstractThinker : IThinker
19  {
20  // Number of board rows
21  private int rows = 0;
22 
23  // Number of board columns
24  private int cols = 0;
25 
26  // How many pieces in sequence to find a winner
27  private int winSequence = 0;
28 
29  // Number of initial round pieces per player
30  private int roundPiecesPerPlayer = 0;
31 
32  // Number of initial square round pieces per player
33  private int squarePiecesPerPlayer = 0;
34 
35  // Time limit for the AI to play
36  private int timeLimitMillis = 0;
37 
40  protected int Rows => rows;
41 
44  protected int Cols => cols;
45 
48  protected int WinSequence => winSequence;
49 
52  protected int RoundsPerPlayer => roundPiecesPerPlayer;
53 
56  protected int SquaresPerPlayer => squarePiecesPerPlayer;
57 
60  protected int TimeLimitMillis => timeLimitMillis;
61 
73  public virtual void Setup(string str) { }
74 
77  public abstract FutureMove Think(Board board, CancellationToken ct);
78 
87  public override string ToString()
88  {
89  // Get base name, without namespace
90  string name = GetType().Name;
91 
92  // Remove "aithinker" or "thinkerai" suffixes, if they exist
93  if (name.Length > "aithinker".Length
94  && (name.ToLower().EndsWith("aithinker")
95  || name.ToLower().EndsWith("thinkerai")))
96  {
97  return name.Substring(0, name.Length - "aithinker".Length);
98  }
99 
100  // Remove "thinker" suffix if it exists
101  if (name.Length > "thinker".Length
102  && name.ToLower().EndsWith("thinker"))
103  {
104  return name.Substring(0, name.Length - "thinker".Length);
105  }
106 
107  // Return unchanged name
108  return name;
109  }
110 
117  protected void OnThinkingInfo(string info)
118  {
119  ThinkingInfo?.Invoke(info);
120  }
121 
124  public event Action<string> ThinkingInfo;
125  }
126 }
